channel.title: Mothership
channel.description: Your Stake in a Sustainable Future

item.title: Mothership DAO
item.dc:creator: mozusa
item.content:encoded:
During the pandemic, millions of Americans either became remote workers or found new ways of supporting themselves with technology.  Many no longer wish to continue their existing lifestyles, tied to one house, and one big mortgage, in one town. They want a residential situation that reflects their new freedom, but it doesn’t exist in many American residential markets.

MOZ USA: A Network of Live/Work/Grow Opportunity Zone Residences

For entrepreneurs, digital nomads, artists, musicians, and individuals who wish to live in a village, but have found themselves locked behind a screen.

MOZ will acquire a series of residential hotels in OZs in the United States offering residents

  • Conference areas suitable for community use 
  • Land lots suitable for community gardening
  • Scalable renovation template that emphasizes technology & sustainability
  • Flexible suites, not dorm style hotel rooms
  • Community programming 
  • Group entrepreneurship activities
  • Community kitchen & meal plans
  • Access to electric fleet vehiclesFree lifetime education/upskilling resources 
  • Credit union
  • Health insurance
  • Membership stake in the MOZ USA DAO

A Powerful Combination

Digital nomads and Opportunity Zones. Opportunity Zones are ~10,000 tracts chosen for a combination of high economic potential and current underperformance. Investors with capital gains tax liability can invest in qualified funds and property dedicated to improving these zones. OZ investments can be in any type of property -- including businesses, not just real estate. If the investor holds for 5 years, the initial capital gains tax is forgiven. If the investor holds for 10 years, the gain on the OZ investment is tax-free. OZs give investors an incentive to build a mix of sustainable cash businesses, high-growth startups, and good places to live and work for multiple generations of Americans.  

Secret Sauce

Mothership OZ harnesses full-stack applied blockchain technology along with the business experience to put it to use and a network of great partners who can execute.

HOW IT WORKS

Join the DAO

It's free to join, with no obligations. You will receive one voting token in the DAO

Play the Game

Mozopoly is an interactive game that helps identify the best Mothership OZ Properties. 10,000+ variations!

Acquire Properties

Potential Mothership OZ residence properties are identified by a vote of the Mothership DAO

A Home for Everyone

Mothership properties are managed at the community level, with support from the Mothership DAO

Health & Credit

Mothership DAO will vote on member benefits such as health insurance and credit unions

How do I join the Mothership DAO?

  • Generate an avatar by selecting one of the AI generation styles below
  • Avatars are created by your seed text input, or by a photo up upload.
  • Do not include any sensitive information in your seed phrase.
  • Your seed phrase/photo will not be used for any purpose than generating your Mothership DAO Avatar. 
  • Check your Polygon wallet on Opensea
  • Click unlockable content
  • Join Discord Server and/or Telegram groups

AVATAR STYLES

Neural Net

Random Avatar

AI Cartoon

Artistic Style

Neural Net Neural Net avatars are generated from seed content and produce a unique image that will be used to identify you, along with your wallet address.  Check your Polygon wallet on Opensea to view your Mothership DAO membership token. Random Avatar Random avatars are generated from seed content and produce a unique image that will be used to identify you, along with your wallet address.  Check your Polygon wallet on Opensea to view your Mothership DAO membership token. AI Cartoon AI Cartoon avatars are generated from a photo, and produce a unique image that will be used to identify you, along with your wallet address.  Check your Polygon wallet on Opensea to view your Mothership DAO membership token. Artistic Style Artistic Style avatars are generated from a photo, and produce a unique image that will be used to identify you, along with your wallet address.  Check your Polygon wallet on Opensea to view your Mothership DAO membership token.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: mozusa
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://landofoz.club.

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: mozusa
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: mozusa
item.content:encoded:
MOTHERSHIP

YOUR STAKE IN A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE
Find out More

A Modern Lifestyle Opportunity

Mothership USA Residences

A BETTER PLACE TO LIVE
A BETTER WAY TO LIVE

Mothership exists to support sustainable, profitable lifestyles

A CLEAR NEED

During the pandemic, millions of Americans either became remote workers or found new ways of supporting themselves with technology. Many no longer wish to continue their existing lifestyles, tied to one house, and one big mortgage, in one town. They want a residential situation that reflects their new freedom, but it doesn’t exist in many American residential markets.

A CLEAR OPPORTUNITY

Digital nomads meet qualified opportunity zones. Digital nomads have the economic power to transform a local economy, without consuming too many resources. Attracting their knowledge of financial technology and social media into an OZ is a bellwether of success!

Investors with capital gains tax liability have a limited time in which to invest the funds in tax-efficient opportunity zones.*

A TRANSFORMATIVE, PROFITABLE COMBINATION

We give entrepreneurial residents the opportunity to profit in Mothership's success while we support them along their journey.

The result is a new way of living, working and growing.

Together.

SPACIOUS TECH-FORWARD RESIDENCES

TECHNOLOGY & DESIGN FOR MODERN HUMANS

Because home should make life better

Live & Build Centers

Flexible Suites

Meal Plans

Community Garden

Entrepreneurship

Electric Fleets

Credit Union

Health Insurance

Today's humans need more than a gym to stay healthy and productive. 

Mothership has integrated unprecedented technology access into resident membership for a new way of living and working in America.

Mothership OZ properties are chosen for a combination of lifestyle-friendliness and economic growth potential.

Strategically placed in regions where people want to live and work, today and tomorrow, Mothership OZ properties provide residents a long-term real estate investment opportunity.

Without the burdens of home ownership.

With all the perks of living in a global digital network!

MEMBERSHIP IN THE MOTHERSHIP DAO

Mothership residents have a stake in the future of Mothership, and a say in its governance. 

We do this via the Mothership Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO)

THE MOTHERSHIP DAO

A COMMUNITY THAT BUILDS PROFIT

We've reimagined the best of yesterday's housing for the technology and demands of today

A Great Launchpad

A comfortable lifestyle for mobile and decentralized teams.

Flexibility & Stability

The flexibility of renting. The stability and reward of home ownership

Lifestyle Needs

Access to convenient credit union and health insurance without all the hassle

Eco-friendly Fleets

Mobility on demand with modern, efficient electric vehicles

Meetings & Events

Space to host and gather to enjoy the benefits of community

On-site Management

Here to help, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

MOTHERSHIP DAO ROLES

Founders

BUIDL a better tomorrow as a Mothership Founder

Go

Managers

On-site residence opportunities for working managers

Go

Residents

Early access to Mothership, voting rights & benefits

Go

Partners

It takes a village!  Join us if you would like to be a Mothership partner

Go
